title: House of Horrors
description: When Nichole Payne and her son Taylor are found dead in their home, it takes nearly a decade to unravel what happened. For the first time, Nichole’s children Remington and Jackson share what they saw the day their mother and brother were murdered. Andrea Canning reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
